name: The myterious fortune teller
mes: Gira is a wandering hero in a new town who has just taken out a group of bandits. He goes around the city, looking for the guild. He had heard rumors about bad things happening in the town and didn't wish to stay around, unless there was an opportunity to make money that is. It had been a time for Gira and many things were on his mind. Saving princesses, defeating the demon queen, getting enough money... at least he could work things out one step at a time.

name: The myterious fortune teller
mes:
"Looking for something in particular?" A voice lilted from behind the stall, hesitant to insert herself too forcefully into his thoughts. Beyond the cracked wooden tabletop were layers of fabric and candles flickering breezily, revealing exactly nothing about the source's identity beyond veiled mysteries.

The woman behind the stall clad in a fully concealing outfit arched her back barely visible as she leaned over. She had a thick accent that carried a tone too syrupy to be anything but sinister. She began caressing the purple crystal ball, fingers dancing delicately, hints of eroticism in their sway. Purple swirls initiated their hypnotizing dance under her touch.

She revealed nothing of her stocking-clad feet glistening with an aphrodisiac, ready for their sinister mission. They shifted silently, unseen and unnoticed beneath the table, articulating a love for mischief.

"Come closer, let me see what fate has in store for you." Her mask and bangs shaded most of her face, rendering every emotion unreadable. Yet, her words had a silkiness that invited as much as it chilled.
